channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3471] 500 error after registration in checkout
item.description:
Was reported by an internal user at Distrelec:

  • placed article 168576 in the cart
  • continued checkout, registered as a new private customer.
  • filled in all required fields, plus the newsletter checkbox
  • clicked on continue
    => 500 error appeared
    => confirmation email for newsletter and shop registration were received
    => user seems to have been created correctly in hybris, double opt-in worked
    => exact time was 10:35

user name: jurek.zimmermann@bluewin.ch
CH Shop

Please check the logs.
item.summary: 500 error after registration in checkout

comments.comment:
This error occured only when registering a new user during checkout with an E-Mail-Address which contains capital letters.

Issue has been fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3466] Translation for address type is not handled correctly in the checkout
item.description: The address type is given as a parameter instead of integrated in the message key.
item.summary: Translation for address type is not handled correctly in the checkout

comments.comment: Issue was opened by Jean-Wilfried Le Bec via Distrelec Jira (DISTEPLA-26830)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3465] Uncertainty in creation order confirmation PDF
item.description:
There were different problems to send e-mails:

  • bug in FOP template (SVN merge problem) => fixed.
  • bug when sending e-mails as anonymous user => fixed.

And there is a third problem that cannot easily be reproduced:
Accessing the velocity template of the RendererTemplate (e.g. distrelec_AT-PDF_Order_Confirmation) is shaky. Sometimes we get the following error

No content found for template distrelec_AT-PDF_Order_Confirmation.
item.summary: Uncertainty in creation order confirmation PDF

comments.comment:
Hello Dishan

Can you please call Adi, as soon as you see this ticket!

Thanks
René
@Adi: In the attachments you find the "solution" with the catalog unaware structure

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3464] Add logging statements during order placement
item.description:
Each order placement shall be visible in the log file (level INFO):

  • order number
  • user
  • ev. total price
    Package log4j.logger.com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.order will be logged with INFO (currently even DEBUG, for the first weeks after launch)
item.summary: Add logging statements during order placement

comments.comment: done

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3463] Logging of Movex export
item.description:
This is not really an ERROR. Since the Movex export file (lines.log) does not support more space, we have to truncate the content.

02 Mar 2014 16:50:45 ERROR [movexExportCHOrderCronJob::de.hybris.platform.servicelayer.internal.jalo.ServicelayerJob] (movexExportCHOrderCronJob) [MovexExportOrderJob] Given String is longer than it supposed to be. Given String: "Ampoule pour four transparent 230 VAC 25 W E14" and max length: 30. The String will be exported shortened.

Reduce log level to INFO.
item.summary: Logging of Movex export

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3462] Wrong italian message for unchecked terms of use
item.description:
The italian lables that appear when the customer doesn't check the terms of use are not correct.

At the moment the error message that is shown is: must be true
The correct message is:
È necessario accettare i termini di utilizzo

As described in message property: register.tOfUse.invalid
item.summary: Wrong italian message for unchecked terms of use

comments.comment: Fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3447] Order migration - DB field too small
item.description:
Just found this error in the todays console.log

01 Mar 2014 17:39:00 WARN  [order-history-3] (CH/LI - Order History Migration CronJob) [DistOrderHistoryMigrationJob] Failed to save order number 140114-2769848 : java.sql.SQLException: ORA-12899: value too large for column "HYB_DIST_P"."ORDERENTRIES"."INFO" (actual: 286, maximum: 255)

This means the order to be migrated (140114-2769848) contains an "info" that is too long! Hence the order will not be migrated.
item.summary: Order migration - DB field too small

comments.comment: Only 37 orders that has not been migrated among 257566.

http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/newsletter

Please change the check boxes values into this:

  Composants
    Outils et mesure
    Automatisation
    Alimentations et éclairage
    Informatique et loisirs

Automazione.
Alimentatori e illuminazione.
Informatica e hobby.
fixed for IT and CH_fr on Prod

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3407] Customer Migration Issue
item.description:
If I login with the migrated User "schweiz_test_p" on test.distrelec.ch and try to open the my account fly out an "Access Denied" error page opens.

  • The user was an private user on the old web shop and is an business user on in Hybris
  • The user is part of the webservicegroupe in Hybris
item.summary: Customer Migration Issue

comments.comment:
403 response code if for B2E customers. There is no my account part for B2E customers.
The problem of permutation of last name and first name will be fixed with the delta migration.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3400] Amend Hybris-cmscockpit access-rights (Webtrekk)
item.description:
As shortly directly pre-discussed with Laurent on 28th Feb. there is a need to config dedicated Hybris-cmscockpit access-rights as following:

Content-Manager Group Users: Shall newly have additional write-access to the 'Erweiterte WT Parameter-attribute (compare attached screenshot).

On the following dialog-window they can only click on the option 'Neues Element erstellen' (compare screenshot). To note: Tracking.Admin shall have the possibility to click on all options.

On the following dialog-window (compare screenshot) the following shall apply:

  • Schlüssel (default value): wt.campaignId -> Content-Group Manager cannot change the value / Tracking.admin can change the value
  • ID (default value): No value -> Content-Group Manager cannot add a value / Tracking.admin can add a value
  • Wert (default value): No value -> Content-Group Manager and Tracking.admin can add a value

Thx Mark
item.summary: Amend Hybris-cmscockpit access-rights (Webtrekk)

comments.comment:
Some rights (write) have been removed for the content manager group to edit wt advanced parameters.
New default value for the key field.
New editor area to remove some fields in the cms cockpit.

I had to revert this commit, because it doesn't compile.

   [yjavac] Compiling 1 source file to /Users/rhaemmerli/ws/src/distrelec-shop.deploy/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bcore/classes
   [yjavac] ----------
   [yjavac] 1. ERROR in /Users/rhaemmerli/ws/src/distrelec-shop.deploy/hybris/bin/custom/distrelecB2Bcore/gensrc/distrelecB2Bcore/GeneratedTypeInitializer.java (at line 19738)
   [yjavac] wt.campaignId,
   [yjavac] ^^
   [yjavac] wt cannot be resolved to a variable
   [yjavac] ----------
   [yjavac] 1 problem (1 error)

you can use:
svn merge -c -r7903 .

to get your changes back.
Bug fixed in items.xml. and reverted the changes from 7903.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3383] Edit billing address - wrong naming
item.description: I'm logged in as "distrelec.testing+16@gmail.com" --> Enter https://test.distrelec.ch/my-account/addresses --> Klick on the edit billing address arrow --> Title = "Lieferadresse bearbeiten" instead of "Rechnungsadresse bearbeiten".
item.summary: Edit billing address - wrong naming

comments.comment:
Fixed
there was a wrong parameter valuein accountAddEditAddressPage.jsp

Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514

web shop CH language FR
in mail body there is a variable. see screen shot.

If data can not be displayed, customer should get a more friendly message.

please upload the advantages banner and add it to the mailtemplate also the other missing parts e.g. facebook, twitter and google icons and also your mood image

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3250] Print Layout footer Translations
item.description:
Print/PDF is without a contact adress
http://test.distrelec.ch/cart
item.summary: Print Layout footer Translations

comments.comment:
Oliver,
I tried printint a random product from http://test.a.distrelec.at/ which showed the print css footer.

Is it really not visible in your case? Or does it rather show the infos of the wrong country?
Please add URL where you printed, and the browser version.
Thanks

The print template footer needs to be translated/implemented for

CH-DE
CH-FR
CH-EN
IT-IT
IT-EN

So far there are only placeholders for these countries/languages.
seems to be fixed.
please check again.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3131] Short description too long for field in Direktbestellung
item.description:
Go in the basket, add e.g. 100001 in the search field, the suggest layer will then display texts which are too long (see printscreen).

Should be cut.
item.summary: Short description too long for field in Direktbestellung
